item.title: HITCON CTF 2018 EV3 Basic
item.description: Link to Github Even though this was a pretty simple challenge, I really enjoyed it and wanted to do a write-up for it anyways. EV3 is the latest generation of the LEGO Mindstorms robots, and thanks to this challenge I know a lot more about the Mindstorms Communication and Firmware Developer Kits than I ever thought I would. The challenge includes two files: A picture of the screen of the robot, and a .
